evidence.claim: The company emphasizes its compliance with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of health information.
Information regarding the use of HL7 and FHIR standards is mentioned in their service descriptions, focusing on interoperability with EHRs.
The provider mentions capabilities for integrating with electronic health record systems, suggesting API-based interactions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction use or clearinghouse integration found.
